00013 int bose_gaussian_f(const gsl_vector * x, void *data, gsl_vector * f);
00015 int bose_gaussian_df (const gsl_vector * x, void *data, gsl_matrix * J);
00017 int bose_gaussian_fdf (const gsl_vector * x, void *data,
00018                        gsl_vector * f, gsl_matrix * J);
00019 //Y=x0*g_5/2(e^((x-x1)^2/x2))+x3
00020 #define BOSE_GAUSSIAN_NR 5  //Nr of elements to approximate the function
00021 const float g_2_1 = 1+1/4.0+1/9.0+1/16.0+1/25.0;
00022 
00023 inline double bose_gaussian(const double &x,
00024                         const double &x0,
00025                         const double &x1,
00026                         const double &x2,
00027                         const double &x3)
00028 {
00029       const double n52[5] = {1,2*2*sqrt(2),3*3*sqrt(3),4*4*sqrt(4),5*5*sqrt(5)};  //n^(5/2);
00030       double e= exp(-(x-x1)*(x-x1)/x2);
00031       double ytemp=1;
00032       double Yi=0;//g_(5/2)(Y1)
00033       for(int j=0;j<BOSE_GAUSSIAN_NR;j++) {ytemp*=e; Yi+=ytemp/n52[j];}
00034       Yi*=x0; Yi+=x3;
00035       return Yi;
00036 }

00039 #endif // FITFUNCTIONS_GAUSS_BOSE_H
